Description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.

SubRaces.Description: As a high elf, you have a keen mind and a mastery of at least the basics of magic.

Abilities.title: Darkvision
Abilities.description: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Abilities.title: Keen Senses
Abilities.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

Abilities.title: Fey Ancestry
Abilities.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic cannot put you to sleep.

Abilities.title: Trance
Abilities.description: Elves don’t need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is “trance.”) While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

Abilities.title: Elf Weapon Training
Abilities.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

Abilities.title: Cantrip
Abilities.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

Abilities.title: Extra Language
Abilities.description: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice.

SubRaces.Description: Creatures of magic with strong ties to nature, eladrin live in the twilight realm of the Feywild. Their cities sometimes cross over to the Material Plane, appearing briefly in mountain valleys or deep forest glades before fading back into the Feywild.

Abilities.title: Darkvision
Abilities.description: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Abilities.title: Keen Senses
Abilities.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

Abilities.title: Fey Ancestry
Abilities.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic cannot put you to sleep.

Abilities.title: Trance
Abilities.description: Elves don’t need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is “trance.”) While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

Abilities.title: Elf Weapon Training
Abilities.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

Abilities.title: Fey Step
Abilities.description: You can cast the misty step spell once using this trait. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

Abilities.title: FAKE Language
Abilities.description: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice.
